text:
SpaceX|Software Engineer (Python)| Hawthorne, CA |Onsite

SpaceX is seeking talented Software Engineers to develop our custom built Python test infrastructure. This platform is used to test mission critical systems across our various vehicles including: Falcon 9, Dragon, and eventually BFR. No aerospace experience needed, just a passion for software, proficiency in Python, and desire to make an impact.

https://grnh.se/0cf5a53a2

Engineer the future!
